titleStmt.title: John W. Finnell, Receipt to Peter A. Webb
CWG13826

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 10; Folder Some 1862, 1863, Misc. Correspondence, Recommendation for Jobs, Claims for Pay, Vouchers for Expenses...Few on Ordinance

body.p:
The United States
To Peter A. Webb. Dr.

row.cell: For One Hundred & Eleven rations furnished troops at Brandenburg Ky. as pr contract 8th Decr. 1862 with Major R. R. Jones Ky. vols. at 30¢ for day each
Forty Five rations for men complete from Fourth Jany 1863 to the fourteenth Jany 1863 as per same contract

body.p:
Approved
By order of the Governor
Jno W Finnell
Adjt genl ky vols

I Certify, on honor, that the above account is correct and just, and has not been paid for want of funds; that the articles were purchased at the lowest market price, and will be accounted for on my Return of Provisions for the month of February 1863. The purchase was necessary for the following reasons: the were Absolutely Necesary for Public Servis

R R Jones Comander
Port of Brandenburg C. S.
Ky
Received at Frankfort Ky the 3 of April 1863, of Jno W Finnell adjt Genl Ky Vols -- C.S.U.S. Army, the sum of Forty six dollars and eighty cents, in full of the above account.

No 134 Abst P
Peter A Webb
Dollars 46 80/100
Paid April 3d 1863

The United States
To Peter A. Webb. Dr

row.cell: For One Hundred & Eleven rations furnished troops at Brandenburg. Ky. as per contract 8th Decr. 1862 with Major R. R. Jones. Ky. vols. at 30¢ per day each
Forty Five rations for men complete from Fourth Jany 1863 to the fourteenth Jany 1863 as per same contract

body.p:
Approved
By order of the Governor
Jno W Finnell Adj Genl Ky Vols

I Certify, on honor, that the above account is correct and just, and has not been paid for want of funds; that the articles were purchased at the lowest market price, and will be accounted for on my Return of Provisions for the month of February 1863. The purchase was necessary for the following reasons: the were absolutely Necessary for Public Servise

R R Jones Comander
Port of Brandenburg C. S.
Ky
Received at Frankfort Ky the 3 of April 1863, of Jno W Finnell adjt Genl Ky Vols C.S.U.S. Army, the sum of Forty six dollars and eighty cents, in full of the above account.

No 134 Abst P
Peter A Webb
Dollars 46 80/100
Paid April 3d 1863
